name: solidity-visual-auditor
description: Ethereum Solidity Language customized for developers and auditors using Visual Studio Code

solidity-va.deco.statevars.description: Whether to enable/disable Solidity statevar decoration

solidity-va.deco.arguments.description: Whether to enable/disable semantic highlighting for function arguments. (May require a reload).

solidity-va.deco.argumentsMode.description: Select the mode for semantic highlighting of function arguments. (May require a reload).

solidity-va.deco.argumentsSuffix.description: A custom Suffix/Symbol that is appended to the decoration when performing semantic highlighting for function arguments

solidity-va.deco.warn.reserved.description: Enable/Disable warning decoration when overriding reserved names

solidity-va.deco.warn.externalCalls.description: Enable/Disable gutter-icon decorations for lines performing external address calls

solidity-va.outline.decorations.description: Whether to enable/disable Function Mutability/Accessibility decoration in the outline view
